welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Val-des-Monts, Canada! Known for its stunning natural beauty and charming small-town atmosphere, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Executive Gatineau-Ottawa Airport, offering a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary for all passengers. No password required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rockcliffe St Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, the exclusive terminal at Rockcliffe St Airport provides a luxurious and convenient experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.
